name: Disturbance
description:
Fight in a DNA helix against various enemies, using various weapons - featuring a tardigrade!

We were too much ambitious, and we didn't have enough time to finish it, so the game has lots bugs and balance issues, but we will make updates soon!

Controls:

  • Movements: Z Q S D (the French keyboard layout for W A S D)
  • Shoot with left mouse click
  • Double press a direction key for dash
